TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewComboBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 顯示 控制項中的下拉式方塊。

span.span: Displays a combo box in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用來顯示下拉式方塊控制項，也就是結合清單選取項目欄位的編輯欄位。The class is a specialized type of used to display a combo box control, which is an editing field combined with a list selection field. 目前所選主機中哪些使用者可以變更儲存格的值，假設儲存格的屬性設定為`false`。The currently selected hosts a in which the user can change the cell's value, assuming the cell's property is set to `false`. 不同於控制項，沒有和屬性。Unlike the control, the does not have and properties. 相反地，從下拉式清單中選取值，設定儲存格屬性。Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell property. 資料行類型特製化來保存此類型的儲存格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 根據預設，會初始化為新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要模式之後的現有資料行內的資料格，設定的資料行模式使用儲存格的屬性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 資料行的儲存格相關屬性是類似的範本資料格屬性的包裝函式。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 變更範本儲存格的屬性值會影響只有儲存格根據範本在變更之後所新增。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 變更資料行的儲存格相關的屬性值，不過，將更新的範本資料格和資料行中，所有其他資料格，並重新整理資料行顯示，如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 您通常會搭配輸入，除非您想要覆寫特定資料格的資料行值。You will typically work with the type unless you want to override column values for specific cells. 中所述的指導方針類別用來填入下拉式清單的概觀主題適用於資料格和資料行的執行個體。The guidelines described in the class overview topic for populating the drop-down list applies to both cell and column instances. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範類別，其使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the class, which makes use of the class. 您可以設定的儲存格， ，和相同的方式，在此範例中設定對應的資料行屬性的屬性。You can set the cell , , and properties in the same way that the corresponding column properties are set in this example. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，每當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容會複製到新的儲存格，並確定也將複製的值加入至衍生類別的任何屬性。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源，其中的資料包含可能顯示在下拉式清單中的選項。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source whose data contains the possible selections shown in the drop-down list.

value.span: 或 ，包含用來提供資料給此下拉式清單的值集合。

span.span: An or that contains a collection of values used to supply data to the drop-down list.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常會將整個資料行的資料格，透過設定屬性。Typically this property will be set for an entire column of cells through the property. 可能的話，請設定來源，包含只可以選取項目，類似於資料行的選取項目。If possible, set to a source containing only the possible selections, like a column of selections. 然後在屬性不需要設定。Then the property doesn't need to be set. 但如果來源是更複雜，設定要從中擷取可能的選取範圍的屬性或資料行名稱。But if the source is more complicated, set to the name of the property or column from which to retrieve possible selections. 如果設為字串陣列，然後和不需要設定，因為陣列中的每個字串將可用值和顯示。If is set to a string array, then and do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display. 變更屬性可讓儲存格重新初始化其集合和重繪本身。Changing the property causes the cell to reinitialize its collection and redraw itself. 當您變更的值屬性，控制會嘗試使用和屬性值與新的資料來源，並將每個屬性設定為`null`如果找不到它的值。When you change the value of the property, the control attempts to use the and property values with the new data source, and sets each property to `null` if its value cannot be found. 此程序期間發生任何例外狀況會被忽略，除非它是下列重大例外狀況的其中一個： ， ， ， ， ， ，或。Any exception that occurs during this process is ignored unless it is one of the following critical exceptions: , , , , , , or . 當設定，附加至資料來源的事件。When the is set, the attaches to the event of the data source. 當是從卸離，才會立即釋放資源。When the is detached from the , the resource is not immediately released. 處置連接的資料來源時，釋放資源。The resource is released when the attached data source is disposed. 若要立即釋放回收資源，設定屬性`null`。To release the resource for garbage collection immediately, set the property to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，此字串指定要從何處蒐集要顯示在下拉式清單中的選項。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies where to gather selections to display in the drop-down list.

value.span: 字串，指定在 屬性中指定的資料來源內的屬性或資料行的名稱。

span.span: A string specifying the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the property.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示將不會使用 屬性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the property will not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示下拉式方塊的下拉式清單中顯示的文字資訊。 represents the text information displayed in the combo box drop-down list. 相反地，屬性表示選取範圍的對應值。In contrast, the property represents the corresponding value of a selection. 如果來顯示選取之項目的資料應該從非預設屬性或資料行中描繪，然後必須設定除了。If the data for the selections displayed by the is supposed to be drawn from a nondefault property or column of the , then must be set in addition to . 當設為字串陣列，不需要設定，因為陣列中的每個字串會用來當做有效的顯示字串和有效的基礎值。When is set to a string array, does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and a valid underlying value. 載入下拉式方塊選擇的另一種方式是使用屬性。Another way of loading combo box selections is to use the property. 必須包含要從中收集選取的屬性名稱。 must contain the property name from which to gather the selections. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值可判斷當此下拉式方塊不在編輯模式中時，要如何顯示它。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when it is not in edit mode.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時不是處於編輯模式，無論它是唯讀屬性會影響儲存格的外觀。The property affects the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode, and regardless of whether it is read-only. 儲存格處於編輯模式，它一律會看起來像控制項。When the cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 如果屬性值是`true`、屬性會是目前儲存格時，會影響資料格。If the property value is `true`, the property affects the cell only when it is the current cell. 行為和外觀的下拉箭號會以屬性。The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow is indicated by the property. 若要啟用滑鼠指標在儲存格上方時，反白顯示資料格，您必須設定屬性和屬性值設定為。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over the cell, you must set the property to and the property value to . 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下拉式方塊只會處理文字資訊，因為基礎的格式化值的型別一定是。Because a combo box only handles text information, the type of the underlying formatted value is always . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料格內容的型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此範例中，屬性用來判斷是否要包含儲存格然後再嘗試將值轉換。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#10)]

param.name: graphics
param.span: 儲存格的圖形內容。

summary.span: 取得儲存格資料的格式化值。

returns.span: 儲存格的資料在套用格式化之後的值；如果儲存格不是 控制項的一部分，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會呼叫此方法，將資料格的值轉換為對等的顯示值所表示的型別屬性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控制項將資料格的值傳遞至這個方法在`value`參數。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 這個方法會先判斷是否`value`判斷是否符合下列條件的其中一個是否有效。This method first determines whether `value` is valid by determining whether one of the following conditions is met. - `value` 存在於或集合。`value` is present in the or the collection. - `value` 為 `null` 或 。`value` is `null` or . - `value` 是和屬性值代表型別。`value` is and the property value represents the type. 如果`value`不正確，就會發生事件。If `value` is not valid, the event occurs. 如果沒有處理常式集合或這個事件沒有處理常式屬性`true`，擲回例外狀況。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果`value`有效的處理常式或事件並不會設定屬性`true`、就會發生事件。If `value` is valid or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. A事件處理常式可以修改同時`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果未設定此處理常式屬性`true`，不過，這個方法會格式化`value`使用的格式屬性`cellStyle`物件。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 這會導致額外事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式設定成功，這個方法會傳回格式化的值，以顯示在控制項。If formatting is successful, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

exception.span: 格式化失敗，而且 控制項的 事件沒有處理常式，或是該處理常式將 屬性設定為 。

span.span: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the event of the control or the handler set the property to .

exception.span: 此例外狀況物件通常可以針對型別轉換錯誤轉換成型別 ，或是在 或 集合中找不到 時，轉換成型別 。

span.span: The exception object can typically be cast to type for type conversion errors or to type if cannot be found in the or the collection.

span.span: Attaches and initializes the hosted editing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化主控控制基底中所述方法。The method initializes the hosted control as described in the base method. 此外，對於每個引動過程，會進行下列作業：In addition, for every invocation, does the following: - 設定託管的視覺屬性控制，例如， ，和，來比對的對應屬性的目前儲存格。Sets the visual properties of the hosted control, such as , , and , to match the corresponding properties of the current cell. - 設定裝載的資料繫結屬性控制，例如， ，和，來比對的對應屬性的目前儲存格。Sets the data-bound properties of the hosted control, such as , , and , to match the corresponding properties of the current cell. - 重新初始化主控屬性控制項。Reinitializes the property of the hosted control. 這個方法也會調整儲存格的維度，以便容納託管控制項。This method also adjusts the cell's dimensions to accommodate the hosted control.

summary.span: 取得物件，表示顯示在下拉式清單中的選項。

span.span: Gets the objects that represent the selection displayed in the drop-down list.

value.span: 包含選項的 。

span.span: An containing the selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您取得的目前儲存在中的項目清單的參考。This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the . 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 如需詳細資訊，可以執行的工作上集合，請參閱。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the collection, see . 如果將字串新增到，然後和不需要設定，因為每個加入的字串將可用值和顯示。If strings are added to , then and do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display. > [!NOTE] > 不支援使用多個具有相同的顯示值的項目。 does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values. 如果屬性設定，然後在屬性不能使用。If the property is set, then the property cannot be used. 資料格的格式化的值必須一律是中的值的其中一個集合或錯誤發生和儲存格的值將還原為集合中的第一個項目。The formatted value of the cell must always be one of the values in the collection or an error will occur and the cell value will revert to the first item in the collection. 您可以自訂此行為處理和事件。You can customize this behavior by handling the and events. 將此屬性設定為父資料行的值以外的值屬性將會強制的資料列變成非共用，配置額外的記憶體。Setting this property to a value other than the value of the parent column's property will force the row to become unshared, allocating extra memory. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#30)]

param.name: e

returns.span: 如果應該要啟動編輯模式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if edit mode should be started; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性控制設為 或，此控制項會使用這個方法來判斷此資料格取得焦點時使用者按下的 F2 以外的索引鍵是否會導致儲存格進入編輯模式。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 這個方法會傳回`true`如果 e 參數表示其中一種下列按鍵或按鍵組合： F4、 ALT + 向上鍵、 ALT + 向下箭號或 （例如字母、 數字、 標點符號或空格鍵） 的一般資料輸入金鑰未加上 ALT 或 ctrl 鍵，不含 SHIFT + 空格鍵，由控制項用於選取項目之用。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates one of the following keys or key combinations: F4, ALT+UP ARROW, ALT+DOWN ARROW, or an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設鍵盤和滑鼠處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否會為下拉式方塊中的項目自動排序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are automatically sorted.

value.span: 如果下拉式方塊已排序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定是否裝載排序與現有項目，並新增到適當的排序位置清單中的項目。This property specifies whether the hosted sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 當這個屬性設定為`false`，新的項目加入現有清單的結尾。When this property is set to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 排序作業不會區分大小寫，以依字母順序遞增的順序執行。The sorting operation is case-insensitive and performed in alphabetically ascending order. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#30)]

exception.span: 嘗試對附加至資料來源的儲存格進行排序。

span.span: An attempt was made to sort a cell that is attached to a data source.

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，此字串指定要從何處蒐集用於下拉式清單中的基礎值。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies where to gather the underlying values used in the drop-down list.

value.span: 指定屬性或資料行名稱的字串。

span.span: A string specifying the name of a property or column.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示會忽略這個屬性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示選取範圍的對應值。 represents the corresponding value of a selection. 相反地，屬性表示下拉式清單中顯示的文字資訊。In contrast, the property represents the text information displayed in the drop-down list. 屬性指定的資料來源值的下拉式清單中顯示的選取項目。The property specifies the data source for the value of the selections displayed in the drop-down list. 如果來顯示選取之項目的資料應該從非預設屬性或資料行中描繪，然後必須設定除了。If the data for the selections displayed by the is supposed to be drawn from a nondefault property or column of the , then must be set in addition to . 當設為字串陣列，不需要設定，因為陣列中的每個字串會用來當做有效的顯示字串和有效的基礎值。When is set to a string array, does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and a valid underlying value. 載入下拉式方塊選擇的另一種方式是使用屬性。Another way of loading combo box selections is to use the property. 必須包含要從中收集選取的屬性名稱。 must contain the property name from which to gather the selections. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

exception.span: 屬性不是 ，且設定這個屬性時的指定值不是 或 ，且未對資料來源內的有效屬性或資料行命名。

span.span: The property is not and the specified value when setting this property is not or and does not name a valid property or column in the data source.
